comments: Jackson Jr. (MEM) brings both arms forward slightly prior to marginal contact occurring with Sharpe's (POR) front/side at the end of the drive.
Smart (MEM) contests Brogdon's (POR) jump shot and the contact after the release, and follow-through, is marginal.
Ayton (POR) goes to, not through, Jackson Jr. (MEM) after the release of the jump shot attempt and marginal contact occurs as they come together.
Bane (MEM) brings his hands toward Ayton's (POR) back and marginal contact occurs as they each attempt to obtain rebounding position.
Camara (POR) and Jackson Jr. (MEM) each make clean contact with the ball as simultaneous marginal side-to-side contact occurs during the rebound.
Ayton (POR) grasps and then quickly releases Jackson Jr.'s (MEM) left arm, and marginal contact occurs prior to Ayton tying Jackson Jr. up on the floor. A jump ball is correctly assessed.
Brogdon (POR) releases away from Smart's (MEM) side and marginal contact occurs as he moves to retrieve the jump ball.
Smart (MEM) is shuffling alongside Brogdon's (POR) path when marginal body contact occurs as they come together inside the perimeter.
Grant (POR) releases his off-arm away from Roddy's (MEM) front and marginal contact occurs as Grant slows his momentum during the drive.
Roddy (MEM) initiates contact with Grant's (POR) right wrist prior to the release of his jump shot attempt.
Grant (POR) briefly has his arm around Jackson Jr.'s (MEM) upper half before correcting.
Smart (MEM) is established in Grant's (POR) path and absorbs the marginal body contact that occurs at the end of the drive.
Smart (MEM) is moving backward slightly and then stops his momentum prior to marginal body contact occurring with Brogdon (POR) during the layup attempt.
Camara (POR) contests the dunk attempt and marginal arm contact occurs with Williams (MEM) as Williams finishes at the rim.
Williams (MEM) hangs on the rim and is assessed a technical foul.
Williams (MEM) turns into Brogdon (POR) and initiates body contact that affects Brogdon's SQBR during the drive.
Smart (MEM) and Camara (POR) engage and disengage with one another following the expiration of the pick.

Ayton (POR) and Jackson Jr. (MEM) engage and disengage with one another after the release of the jump shot attempt. Ayton then makes contact with the ball and the part of Jackson Jr.'s hand that is on the ball during the rebound.
Jackson Jr. (MEM) touches the ball last before it goes out of bounds.
Smart (MEM) makes clean contact with the ball and dislodges it away from Grant (POR) as the hand-off occurs.
Possession is awarded to Portland. However, Brogdon's (POR) right hand touches the ball last before going out of bounds. Possession should have been awarded to Memphis.
Roddy (MEM) turns alongside Sharpe's (POR) path and marginal body contact occurs during Sharpe's drive.
Roddy (MEM) initiates contact across Sharpe's (POR) left arm after Sharpe's gather.
Camara (POR) wraps Bane's (MEM) right side and affects Bane's FOM as he cuts off-ball.
Brogdon (POR) is moving forward slightly when marginal contact occurs with Smart's (MEM) back as Smart receives the pass in the corner.
Smart (MEM) fumbles the ball as he attempts to gather it at the end of the drive. He legally re-gains full control of it and establishes his left foot as his pivot, which he maintains before passing.
Sharpe (POR) cleanly blocks Kennard's (MEM) jump shot attempt.
Sharpe (POR) releases his off-arm away from Smart's (MEM) side and marginal contact occurs after they come together along the perimeter.
Smart (MEM) initiates contact across Sharpe's (POR) right arm at the end of the drive.
Kennard's (MEM) left arm slightly extends toward Camara's (POR) back and marginal contact occurs as the rebound falls overhead.
Jackson Jr. (MEM) establishes himself in Grant's (POR) path and does not deliver illegal contact as he sets the pick.
Ayton (POR) turns slightly prior to marginal body contact occurring with Jackson Jr.'s (MEM) side after Jackson Jr.'s gather.
Tillman (MEM) and Grant (POR) engage and disengage with one another, and marginal contact occurs as Grant cuts off-ball.
Grant (POR) establishes himself in Jackson Jr.'s (MEM) path and does not deliver illegal contact.
Bane (MEM) splits his feet prior to releasing his dribble. Bane then gathers the ball and hops consecutively on his right foot at the end of the drive.
Camara (POR) does not maintain a legal guarding position as Bane (MEM) slips to his right side and the ensuing body contact affects Bane's driving shot attempt.
Ayton (POR) is imminently exiting the lane within three seconds.
Brogdon (POR) moves to turn alongside Smart's (MEM) path and marginal body contact occurs when they come together inside the perimeter.
Ayton (POR) brings his right hand toward Tillman's (MEM) front and marginal contact occurs as Tillman elevates for the layup attempt.
Tillman (MEM) fumbles the ball during his upward shooting motion and legally makes contact with it as he attempts the controlled tip thereafter.
Tillman (MEM) commits a take foul on Brogdon (POR). The transition take foul rule does not apply to the last two minutes of either the fourth quarter or overtime.
Brogdon (POR) brings his left hand forward toward Smart's (MEM) front and marginal contact occurs prior to Smart losing control of the ball on his own as he attempts to pass.
Bane (MEM) initiates contact across Sharpe's (POR) left arm and affects Sharpe's SQBR.
Brogdon (POR) is retreating alongside Smart's (MEM) path and marginal body contact occurs during Smart's driving shot attempt.
Tillman (MEM) and Grant (POR) engage and disengage with one another during the inbound.
Tillman (MEM) makes clean contact with the ball and dislodges it away from Grant (POR) prior to incidental contact occurring.
